page.title: 09Cossington traffic survey
page.content: We wanted to findout how much traffic passed through Cossington in a week.We thought that people in the future would like this information.The main road that passes through our village is the B5328 , and our survey took place in June 1985.We stood outside the school from 7.30 to 9.15 am and from 4.45 to 6.00 pm and this is what we found out.We found out that in that whole week 5787 cars, lorrys, vans,motorbikes, bikes, tractors, buses,went through Cossington.Of this total there were 4283 cars, 451 vans, 218 lorries, 305 bikes, 299 motorbikes, 25 tractors and 48 buses. While we were doing the survey it was somtimes cold and miserable and misty but we got rewarded with a cup of tea or coffee made by Mrs Cooper our dinner lady . by simon Milner
